meanings.definition: To crossbreed by interbreeding different varieties or species.
meanings.sent1: Farmers intercrosses different types of plants to create new hybrids.
meanings.sent2: She intercrosses roses and tulips to see what new flowers will bloom.
meanings.sent3: The bees intercrosses the daisies and sunflowers, creating a colorful garden mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The chef intercrosses flavors to invent a unique dish that surprises the taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The scientist intercrosses genes to study how traits are inherited in organisms.

meanings.definition: The act of crossing or interbreeding different varieties or species.
meanings.sent1: The intercrosses of different dog breeds resulted in adorable mixed puppies.
meanings.sent2: The intercrosses between wild and domestic plants can lead to stronger crops.
meanings.sent3: The zoo showcased the intercrosses of rare animals, fascinating visitors.
meanings.sent4: The intercrosses of cultures in the city created a vibrant and diverse community.
meanings.sent5: The intercrosses of music genres produced a unique and catchy melody.
